root.name: Python Plugin Packager
root.description:
This plugin allows to create an Icy plugin from a Python script, and produce a jar that can distributed to other Icy users (through Icy website in particular).
Thanks to this took, neither Eclipse nor the JDK are needed to develop plugins for Icy.
